translations: n.坟墓，（废旧机器等）堆积处（grave的复数）

sentences.sentence: Soldiers helped to bury the dead in large communal graves.
sentences.translation: 士兵们协助将死者埋葬在大型公共墓地里。

sentences.sentence: The leafy, spreading trees were planted on graves and as part of traditional rituals.
sentences.translation: 这些枝繁叶茂的树木被种植在坟墓上，作为传统仪式的一部分。

sentences.sentence: When I got there, I found a woman in front of one of the graves I would lay a stone on.
sentences.translation: 当我到那里的时候，我发现一个女人站在了我要放一块石头的坟墓前面。
